description: Move canonical AgentBus implementation (_agent_coordination/core/agent_bus.py) and essential dependencies (AgentRegistry, EventDispatcher, ShutdownCoordinator, bus_types) to the root core/coordination/ directory.
Refactor all agent imports and interactions within the '_agent_coordination' subsystem to use the canonical AgentBus from core/coordination/.

Refactor all agent imports and interactions within the 'dreamforge' subsystem to use the canonical AgentBus from core/coordination/. Update agents (Planner, Calendar, TaskOrchestrator, etc.) to align with the event-driven model.

Refactor all agent imports and interactions within the 'social' subsystem to use the canonical AgentBus from core/coordination/. Update agents (SocialMediaAgent, TaskExecutor, etc.) to align with the event-driven model.
Refactor any remaining agent imports/interactions in the root 'agents/' directory and other core services to use the canonical AgentBus from core/coordination/.
Delete the old AgentBus implementations: dreamforge/core/coordination/agent_bus.py and social/core/agent_bus.py after verifying all dependencies are updated.
Move the canonical TemplateEngine class from agents/dreamforge/core/template_engine.py to a new file core/rendering/template_engine.py. Ensure the default_template_engine instance is created.

Integrate the 'missing variable check' logic (conceptually from _agent_coordination/template_engine.py) into the canonical TemplateEngine class in core/rendering/template_engine.py, perhaps as an optional mode or strict setting.
Move the 'generate_post_from_template' helper function (conceptually from _agent_coordination/template_engine.py) to a more appropriate location like agents/social/utils.py or similar.

Refactor all imports across the project (dreamforge, social, _agent_coordination, agents, core) that used old template engines to now import and use the canonical default_template_engine from core/rendering/template_engine.py.

Design and implement a canonical structured logging service (e.g., core/logging/structured_logger.py) potentially using Python's logging with JSONFormatter, writing to rotating files (e.g., runtime/dream_os.log) and console.
Refactor all subsystems (dreamforge, social, _agent_coordination, core, agents) currently using governance_memory_engine.log_event or basic print/logging to use the new canonical structured logger.
Delete the redundant governance_memory_engine.py file found within dreamforge/core/.
